name: Mullet Maverick: The Quest for the Golden Mullet
name_original: Mullet Maverick: The Quest for the Golden Mullet
description:
Better version (Doesn't have a bug where you get stuck at the end): https://liluo.io/orangehoodiegames/mullet-maverick

Maverick has practiced the art of surfing, skateboarding, and guitar his whole life. Now you are ready for the epic quest to get the golden mullet! You must get to the beach, cross shark bay, and defeat the Oni.
